column1: it was really frustrating. first ryan wasnt avIlable when he said hed be, then when he was finally free he made me come to him even though i was doing him a favor. then he seemed annoyed that i forgotchopsticks which seemed like such a small part of the interaction
inconvenient part was being unsure if the requester would text back and what time worked for them to pick up the item
i was heading to tech express to get coffee
we are in the same class
it was convenient, we saw each other right away.
